item.title: US-60 West at AZ-101 Loop
item.description: US-60 west at AZ-101 Loop. Turn right for AZ-101 Loop north. Continue ahead for AZ-101 Loop south. The AZ-101 Loop shields are blue here, although new AZ-101 Loop signs are traditional black and white.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop East - Exits 8 and 9
item.description: AZ-202 Loop East at Exit 8 - McClintock Road. Approaching Exit 9 - AZ-101 Loop. The left lane is designated for HOV traffic.

item.title: I-10 West at Exit 133B
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 133B - AZ-101 Loop North. This is the western end of the AZ-101 Loop. I-10 continues west to Los Angeles.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 133B and 133A
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 133B - AZ-101 Loop North. Also approaching Exit 133A - 99th Ave./107th Ave.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 134 and Exit 133B
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 134 - 91st Ave. Approaching exit 133B - AZ-101 Loop North. I-10 continues west to Los Angeles.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exits 134 and 133B
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 134 - 91st Ave. Also approaching Exit 133B - AZ-101 Loop North. This AZ-101 Loop sign is in blue. The three loop highways in the Phoenix area all were signed with different colors. All new signs are posted in black and white.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exits 134 and 133B
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 134 - 91st Ave, and Exit 133B - AZ-101 Loop North. AZ-101 Loop shield is blue here.

item.title: AZ-101 South - Exit 2 and Exit 1AB
item.description: AZ-101 Loop South at Exit 2 - McDowell Road. Approaching Exit 1B - I-10 East/Phoenix.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop South - Exit 2 and Exit 1AB
item.description: AZ-101 Loop South approaching Exit 2 - McDowell Road and Exit 1AB-I-10/Phoenix/Los Angeles.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop South - Exit 11
item.description: AZ-101 Loop South at Exit 11 - To US-60/Grand Ave./91st Ave.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop South Approaching Exit 11
item.description: AZ-101 Loop South approaching Exit 11. Use Exit 11 for US-60/To US-93/Kingman/Las Vegas.

item.title: AZ-101 West - Exit 23 and Exit 24
item.description: AZ-101 Loop West at Exit 24 - 19th Ave. Approaching Exit 23 - I-17/Phoenix/Flagstaff. All of the loop highways around Phoenix have different color shields on the older signs. AZ-101 Loop has a blue shield.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop West Approaching Exit 24 and Exit 23BC
item.description: AZ-101 Loop West approaching Exit 24 - 19th Ave. Approaching Exit 23 - I-17/Phoenix/Flagstaff.

item.title: AZ-101 West - Pima Freeway
item.description: AZ-101 Loop West - Pima Freeway

item.title: End AZ-51 North at AZ-101 Loop
item.description: End AZ-51 North at Exit 15A - AZ-101 Loop East and Exit 15B - AZ-101 Loop West.

item.title: End AZ-101 Loop at AZ-202 Loop
item.description: End AZ-101 Loop at AZ-202 Loop.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop South - Exit 61BC
item.description: AZ-101 Loop south at Exit 61B - AZ-202 Loop West and Exit 61C - AZ-202 Loop East. This is the southern end of AZ-101 Loop.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop South - Exit 61 AB
item.description: AZ-101 Loop south at Exit 61A - Price Road. Approaching Exit 61B - AZ-202 Loop West and Exit 61C - AZ-202 Loop East.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching Exit 177 and Exit 176AB
item.description: US-60 west approaching Exit 177 - Dobson Road. Approaching Exit 176B - AZ-101 Loop North and Exit 176A - AZ-101 Loop South.

item.title: US-60 West - Exit 176A and Exit 175
item.description: US-60 west at Exit 176A - AZ-101 Loop South. Approaching Exit 175 - McClintock Drive.

item.title: US-60 West approaching Exit 176AB and Exit 177
item.description: US-60 west at Exit 177 - Dobson Road. Approaching Exit 176B - AZ-101 Loop North and Exit 176A - AZ-101 Loop South.

item.title: I-17 South at Exit 214C - AZ-Loop 101 Split
item.description: I-17 South at Exit 214C - AZ-101 Loop Split.

item.title: Blue AZ-101 Loop On I-17 South Exit 214C
item.description: I-17 South at Exit 214C offramp. Use right lanes for AZ-101 Loop West

item.title: I-17 South at Exit 214C Offramp
item.description: I-17 South at Exit 214C offramp. Use right lanes for AZ-101 Loop West

item.title: I-17 South at Exit 214C
item.description: I-17 South at Exit 214C - AZ-101 Loop. I-17 continues south to Phoenix.
